name: Shortbread Cookie Mix (2pk)
summary: We’re taking Shortbread Cookies beyond the holiday season and making them an everyday delight because they are just too good to only be enjoyed once a year! Our gluten free baking mix is a dream to work with. Just add butter and water (and salt, if you like) and stir it up! It’s super easy to work with and a great way to get kids involved in baking without a ton of mess — and the cookies turn out perfectly each and every time.
